tool_description: Lookup country banks and their SWIFT codes
name: Bank SWIFT codes
title: Bank SWIFT codes

api_list.name: SWIFT codes by country
api_list.description: Returns list of SWIFT codes for a country (use two letter ISO country code)
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bank-swift-codes.p.rapidapi.com/countries/AU/swift-codes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bank-swift-codes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://bank-swift-codes.p.rapidapi.com/countries/{country_code}/swift-codes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bank-swift-codes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Banks by country
api_list.description: Returns list of banks for a country (use two letter ISO country code)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: SWIFT code
api_list.description: Returns details of a SWIFT code
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://bank-swift-codes.p.rapidapi.com/swift-codes/NATAAU33033"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bank-swift-codes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://bank-swift-codes.p.rapidapi.com/swift-codes/{swift_code}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "bank-swift-codes.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
